My first thought was Iyo Shoami given the style of work and their fondness for butterfly designs.  The Ikeda family used a similar cho mon.

Jim



  My thinking goes toward Shoami, possibly Shonai.  Color of metal, use 
  of gold nunome highlighting, and size of seppadai.
